header: We are a consulting firm specialized in Human Capital Management
quienes-somos-text:
We are a team of highly experienced professionals
with a deep knowledge of different industries and markets.
karina:
I got my Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources and Public Relations. I have more than 15 years of experience in the human resources area.
I developed my career working for well-known companies in Argentina, United States, Italy and United Arab Emirates.
MARY:
I’m a Social Psychology professional with more than 15 years of experience.
I developed my career working for multicultural companies in Argentina, United States, Mexico and Brazil.
busqueda-de-talentos-text: We find and select the most appropriate and suitable candidates for our clients.
soluciones-text: We provide different kind of tests based on your organization’s needs.
soluciones-list:
• Assessment Center
  • Potential Assessments
  • Internal Promotions
  • Selection of the most suitable candidates
evaluaciones-text: We offer our clients customized solutions in human capital management.
evaluaciones-list:
• 360 Feedback
  • Engagement Survey
  • Performance Evaluation
  • Building of new teams
valores-text: Our values are the essence of our company’s identity. They support our vision, shape our culture and reflect our actions.
INTEGRIDAD-text: We are transparent, honest and consistent in all we do. We take pride in our work and act with professionalism.
COMPROMISO-text: We treat our team members, customers and suppliers with mutual respect and sensitivity, recognizing the importance of diversity.
RESPETO-text: We are intensely focused on helping our clients achieve their goals. We believe in strong and long-term customer relationships. .
PASION-text: We show pride, enthusiasm and dedication in every thing that we do. We are committed to delivering high quality services.
